## Describe the bug 
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Open v1.als in Ableton Live
2. Add an Eq8 and an Automation for the frequency of the band 2.
3. Save the modified live set to v2.als
4. Run command `alsdiff v1.als v2.als --preset inline`

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Context/Environment
 - OS: [e.g. macOS 26.2]
 - Ableton Live version: [e.g. 12.2.3]
